text: kagra amanage hunka hugahane, vihu osu kumatmimpi vahera ha' ome huzmantegahue. Zamagra mago zankura zamagesa ontahi, hara omegahie hu'za nehu'za kumazmimofona vihu kegina nosu'za, kuma keginamofo kafana hagenonte'za, kahama erigi'za rentrakohu zafanena trohu onte'nazankina ha' ome huzmantegahue hunka hugahane.
